creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two woven panels of stripes in red, yellow, pink and blue hand stitched together; two corners, 5" x 8" and 8" x 12" embroidered in animal-like figures in loose running stitch in green, yellow and blue
title: Woman's Tzute
